name: Trupki
description:
Most simple puzzle game ever possible.
Sliding tiles by rows or columns so that the final shape, made of tile elements, appears!
Game guides you step by step from super simple one turn easy levels through more comprehensive up to almost insane difficulty.
Variability of the game is modified by logical obstacles which may limit or completely distort basic workings of tile movement.



Many players claim that out of the box approach for every level is a must and so Trupki is great tool for developing this ability!
Game plays with total minimalism but insist on aesthetic even in case of level design. However game is not short on levels.
Offers over 300 levels in all difficulties and expected tens of hours of struggle and a-ha moments.
